name: Minun
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: It cheers on friends. If its friends are losing, its body lets off more and more sparks.

attacks.name: Negative Ion
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 30 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Electrishower
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
